OCD.name: Wirepas Data Configuration
OCD.description: Configuration of the Wirepas MQTT transport modules

AD.name: Gateway custom ID / Prefix
AD.description: This custom ID can be used as a prefix if you use the device name

AD.name: Main MQTT transport enabled
AD.description: Enable/Disable the Main MQTT transport service

AD.name: Main MQTT transport secure
AD.description: Enable/Disable TLS for the Main MQTT transport service

AD.name: Main MQTT transport persistance mode
AD.description: Enable/Disable message buffering in the MQTT broker

AD.name: Main Broker address
AD.description: address of the MQTT broker

AD.name: Main Broker port
AD.description: TCP port of the MQTT broker

AD.name: Main Broker username
AD.description: username for the MQTT broker connexion

AD.name: Main Broker password
AD.description: password for the MQTT broker connexion

AD.name: Maximum buffered packets (Black-Hole detection)
AD.description: Maximum number of messages to buffer before rising sink cost (0 will disable Black-Hole detection)

AD.name: Maximum delay without publish (Black-Hole detection)
AD.description: Maximum time to wait in seconds without any successful publish with packet queued before rising sink cost (0 will disable feature)

AD.name: Additional parameters (Expert mode)
AD.description: The list of additional parameters to add to the configuration file (one per line, ex: mqtt_allow_untrusted: True).|TextArea

AD.name: Optional MQTT transport enabled
AD.description: Enable/Disable the Optional MQTT transport service

AD.name: Optional MQTT transport secure
AD.description: Enable/Disable TLS for the Optional MQTT transport service

AD.name: Optional MQTT transport persistance mode
AD.description: Enable/Disable message buffering in the MQTT broker

AD.name: Optional Broker address
AD.description: address of the MQTT broker

AD.name: Optional Broker port
AD.description: TCP port of the MQTT broker

AD.name: Optional Broker username
AD.description: username for the MQTT broker connexion

AD.name: Optional Broker password
AD.description: password for the MQTT broker connexion

AD.name: Additional parameters (Expert mode)
AD.description: The list of additional parameters to add to the configuration file (one per line, ex: mqtt_allow_untrusted: True).|TextArea

AD.name: Local Microservice enabled
AD.description: Enable/Disable the Local Microservice

AD.name: Local Microservice available from the network
AD.description: If disabled, the Local Microservice is available only from the localhost interface
